game.name: RDL
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A cooperative sci-fi horror experience set in the underground facility known as RDL. Explore randomized floors, collect strange artifacts, and survive AURORA - the rogue AI overseeing your “rehabilitation.” Research continues whether you live or not.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A cooperative sci-fi horror experience set in the underground facility known as RDL. Explore randomized floors, collect strange artifacts, and survive AURORA - the rogue AI overseeing your “rehabilitation.” Research continues whether you live or not.
